statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if ! git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$cwd" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then git_info=$(printf "\033[1;34mgit:(\033[0;31m%s\033[1;34m) \033[0;33m✗\033[0m " "$branch"); else git_info=$(printf "\033[1;34mgit:(\033[0;31m%s\033[1;34m)\033[0m " "$branch"); fi; else git_info=""; fi; printf "\033[1;32m➜\033[0m  \033[0;36m%s\033[0m %s" "$dir_name" "$git_info"
